about_the_game:
Embark on a nostalgic journey with Memory Quickie, the classic card-matching game reimagined for the digital era. Test your memory and concentration as you uncover pairs of cards in this timeless pastime.

Key Features:

  • Classic Gameplay: Enjoy the familiar gameplay of the traditional memory game, where you flip cards to find matching pairs.
  • Three Difficulty Levels: Tailor the challenge to your skill level with three difficulty settings: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Each level presents a different size of the board, ensuring fun for players of all ages and expertise.
  • Score-Based Challenges: Race against the clock and aim for the lowest number of flips to earn high scores. Compete with friends and family or challenge yourself to beat your personal best.
  • Engaging Visuals: Immerse yourself in a charming world of colorful cards. The vibrant visuals enhance the gaming experience.
  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Unwind with a soothing soundtrack that accompanies your gameplay. Let the tranquil melodies enhance your concentration as you delve deeper into the world of Memory Quickie.

Embark on a nostalgic journey with Memory Quickie, the classic card-matching game reimagined for the digital era. Test your memory and concentration as you uncover pairs of cards in this timeless pastime.

Key Features:

  • Classic Gameplay: Enjoy the familiar gameplay of the traditional memory game, where you flip cards to find matching pairs.
  • Three Difficulty Levels: Tailor the challenge to your skill level with three difficulty settings: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Each level presents a different size of the board, ensuring fun for players of all ages and expertise.
  • Score-Based Challenges: Race against the clock and aim for the lowest number of flips to earn high scores. Compete with friends and family or challenge yourself to beat your personal best.
  • Engaging Visuals: Immerse yourself in a charming world of colorful cards. The vibrant visuals enhance the gaming experience.
  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Unwind with a soothing soundtrack that accompanies your gameplay. Let the tranquil melodies enhance your concentration as you delve deeper into the world of Memory Quickie.
name: Memory Quickie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz x64
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz x64
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
